student.name: Minh Anh
student.content: Thanks to FocusFlow, I can focus on studying much better! Since using the app, my exam preparation time has been twice as effective. The lo-fi music in the app is great, helping me not get distracted by surrounding noise.

developer.name: Quang Huy
developer.content: Amazing app for devs like me! Pomodoro timer is accurate, ambient music helps code flow continuously. Time tracking helps me track productivity really well.

manager.name: Thanh Hằng
manager.content: FocusFlow has completely changed my way of working. No more procrastination, all tasks are completed on time. Beautiful interface, easy to use, no annoying ads.

highschool.name: Văn Đức
highschool.content: Preparing for university with FocusFlow is really effective. 25 minutes of focus + 5 minutes of rest is just enough so the brain doesn't get overloaded. Nature music helps me relax and focus more.
